Leaves: Blades to 45 cm long, hairy or hairless, ring of hair at base.
Flowers: Spikelike, to 20 cm long. Dense, cylindrical, cream-coloured with purple tinge.
FruitSeeds: With bristles and dense wooly hairs, spaced on spike.
DistinguishingFeatures: Very similar to perennial Mission grass and various other feathergrasses.
